vsParam: When are we going for a treasure hunt?

Treasure hunt!?
[px], are we going for a treasure hunt?

Don't be this casual!
[px], aren't you an alchemist~?

Ha-ha-ha... In the Academy, treasure hunts are
carried out by students of Relicology and Adventure...

Huh... Is that so?
Isn't it everyone's dream to search for treasures?

Everyone has their dreams...
But I don't think they have the same dream...

Hmm, yeah? We're so different.
For me, I want to obtain countless treasures.

And see all pretty and precious
things in this world.

Ha— So assertive.
How should I put it... It is in character for Verbena to want that.

You were born into a noble family, right? So it means,
you were often exposed to many treasures... weren't you?

Yeah, you're right.
I did see many treasures since I was a child.

But... but those were my parents' possessions,
and they are not the same as the things I obtained by myself.

The treasure that I want the most and later obtained by
committing a great amount of effort is the most valuable!

For this very reason, I made a living as a pirate.
We must get the things we want through hard work!

I see...
I think I know how you feel.

Hehe, right?
So... there's only one thing we need to do!

Come on, everyone! Let's go find treasures!
Immediately! Right now! Move move move!!

Wow— Wait! Don't push me!
Gee, how did this happen?

Be quick! Treasures wait for no man!
We must set sail before someone else gets them first!!
